review: Really opens up access to my Prime library, making viewing on my TV easy and with great quality.  Although running wireless, streamed films load/start very quickly and I don't get distracting "buffering" interruptions.  I only use this for Amazon Prime as I do Not have Hulu, nor NetFlix,Pandora, etc...On the negative side: - I don't like how the HDMI dongle has to be be plugged into the wall for power all the time -it's already crowded back there - The remote isn't always responsive -requiring several presses and sometimes it buffers the clicks so it goes way past the desired place. - Only supports Miracast for device mirroring/broadcasting -which for an Apple household is a non-starter
